name: Everest
hint: The highest mountain on Earth at 8,849 meters, on the border of Nepal and Tibet

name: K2
hint: The second-highest mountain in the world, on the China-Pakistan border in the Karakoram range

name: Kangchenjunga
hint: The third-highest mountain in the world, on the border of Nepal and Sikkim, India

name: Fuji
hint: Japan's highest and most iconic mountain, a symmetrical volcanic cone southwest of Tokyo

name: Elbrus
hint: The highest mountain in Europe and the Caucasus, a dormant volcano in southern Russia

name: Annapurna
hint: A massif in the Himalayas of north-central Nepal, one of the most dangerous peaks to climb

name: Nanga Parbat
hint: The ninth-highest mountain in the world, known as the 'Killer Mountain', in Pakistan

name: Makalu
hint: The fifth-highest mountain in the world, located on the border of Nepal and Tibet, near Everest

name: Cho Oyu
hint: The sixth-highest mountain in the world, on the Nepal-Tibet border, considered the easiest 8,000m peak

name: Kinabalu
hint: The highest peak in Borneo and Malaysia, located in Sabah on the island of Borneo
